description.narrative: Both organizations seek to adhere to the principles, having already undergone a CPP assessment, and want to continue with an improvement of their business model. Microrate Incorporated is the consultant who will execute the assessments with both clients. Capacity development funding will be provided to both organizations for the purposes of this assessment, and thus used to strengthen their client protection credentials.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
